dmca.title: DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
http://www.robfitch.com/images/galleries/pregnancy-pics-1-max.jpg

Dear Google Team, 


The spam website that is using my image without my permission is at it
again. When I just did a Google Image search for "Pregnancy pictures" on my
iMac one of my images showed up under the blog
of http://dextercuretons.blogspot.com/2011/06/professional-
pregnancy.html My copyrighted photograph is the 10th image on this blog
page. I've attached a copy of the image for your reference. Additionally,
please compare to my images
at http://www.robfitch.com/children/maternity1.html & http://www.robfitch.co
m/children/maternity2.html 


WHEN THE IMAGE IS CLICKED THE WEBSITE
OF http://dextercuretons.blogspot.com/2011/06/professional-
pregnancy.html CYCLES IMMEDITATELY THROUGH SERVERAL URLS MAKING IT
IMPOSSIBLE TO COPY THE LANDING PAGE OF THE SITE THAT STOLE MY WORK. THE
SEARCHER IS THEN SENT TO A SPAM WEBSITE OFFERING FREE IPADS OR MACBOOK
AIRS. THE ONLY WAY TO GET OFF THIS PAGE IS TO FORCEABLY CLOSE YOUR BROWSER!
YOU WAITED OVER A WEEK THE LAST TIME I COMPLAINED ABOUT THIS SITE AND BY
THEN THE SPAMMERS HAD PACKED UP SHOP - TEMPORAILY IT SEEMS. PLEASE, PLEASE
DO A SEARCH NOW!!! AND DO WHAT YOU CAN TO REMOVE THIS SITE FORM YOUR INDEX
RESULTS. MY IMAGE LINKING THROUGH GOOGLE TO A SPAM SITE DOES GOOGLE NO
SERVICE AND IS HARMING BY REPUITATION. I WOULD FILE A DMCA COMPLAINT BUT
AGAIN THERE IS NO WAY TO DO THIS!!!! THE ONLY WAY FOR YOU TO SEE THE IMAGE
I'M REFERRING TO IS TO COMPARE THE ATTACHED IMAGE TO THE SEARCH RESULTS. 



When the same search is conducted on a windows pc the offending blog is
changed to http://www.williamrossettis.blogspot.com

the same exact cycling of URLs occurs with the end result being a SPAM
website that won't let you leave! 


Again, please do a search now and help me resolve this serious DMCA
violation. 


Rob Fitch 



Robert Austin Fitch Photography


www.robfitch.com

info@robfitch.com

201.658.8076
